title: Bobby And Amy’s Awkward Encounters + Tim McGraw On Paul McCartney Watching Him Side Stage + Bobby Talks About Writing Another Book
itunes:title: Bobby And Amy’s Awkward Encounters + Tim McGraw On Paul McCartney Watching Him Side Stage + Bobby Talks About Writing Another Book
description:
Bobby talks about writing his third book and what it would include. Tim McGraw joins us for the Friday Morning Conversation to talk about Paul McCartney watching him at iHeartRadio Music Festival and Old Town Road. Bobby and Amy share some super awkward encounters they had recently.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
